occupation: Data Science - Associate Consultant at TheMathCompany
headline: \ud835\udde0\ud835\udde6\ud835\uddd5\ud835\uddd4@\ud835\udde6\ud835\uddd6\ud835\udde8 | \ud835\udded\ud835\udde6 | \ud835\udde9\ud835\udddc\ud835\udde7
summary:
I am a budding Business Analyst adept in collecting, analyzing, and transforming data into insights. An experienced and highly skilled analyst with a proven background in requirement elicitation, process improvement, and stakeholder relationship management for a globally leading pharmaceutical company. I have 3+ years of experience in the healthcare domain.

My passion for Data Analytics allows me to provide data-driven, action-oriented solutions to challenging business problems. With strong problem-solving and communication skills, I am pursuing Masters in Business Analytics at Santa Clara University.

When I’m not working, I love meeting new people, working my way through every recipe in the family cookbook, focus on learning new things and indulging my love for seeing new places.

• Created proposal models after identifying Business leads to convert them into opportunities
